templates.title: Value templates
templates.description:
You can provide your own templates to modify values retrieved from TGE.

Available variables: 
* `fixing1_rate`
* `fixing1_volume`
* `fixing2_rate`
* `fixing2_volume`

To get time of data use `now()` function.

WARNING: calculations are performed using z≈Ç/MWh and MWh - templates should return values using the same units. Conversion to units configured in the previous step is performed automatically in the later steps of data processing.

[More info about this functionality](https://github.com/PiotrMachowski/Home-Assistant-custom-components-TGE?tab=readme-ov-file#value-templates)
